vernac_cmds: Record Filter (X:Type) : Type := { filter_family: Family X; filter_intersection: forall S1 S2:Ensemble X, In filter_family S1 -> In filter_family S2 -> In filter_family (Intersection S1 S2); filter_upward_closed: forall S1 S2:Ensemble X, In filter_family S1 -> Included S1 S2 -> In filter_family S2; filter_full: In filter_family Full_set; filter_empty: ~ In filter_family Empty_set }.

Record filter_basis {X:Type} (F:Filter X) (B:Family X) : Prop := { filter_basis_elements: Included B (filter_family F); filter_basis_cond: forall S:Ensemble X, In (filter_family F) S -> exists S':Ensemble X, In B S' /\ Included S' S }.

Lemma filter_finite_indexed_intersection: forall {X:Type} (F:Filter X) {A:Type} (S:IndexedFamily A X), FiniteT A -> (forall a:A, In (filter_family F) (S a)) -> In (filter_family F) (IndexedIntersection S).
replace (IndexedIntersection S) with (Intersection (IndexedIntersection (fun a:T => S (Some a))) (S None)).
replace (IndexedIntersection S) with (IndexedIntersection (fun x:X0 => S (f x))).
Hypothesis B_basis_cond: forall S1 S2:Ensemble X, In B S1 -> In B S2 -> exists T:Ensemble X, In B T /\ Included T (Intersection S1 S2).
refine (Build_Filter X [ S:Ensemble X | exists T:Ensemble X, In B T /\ Included T S ] _ _ _ _).
destruct (B_basis_cond T1 T2 H H0) as [T' []].
exists T; split; auto with sets.
apply Extensionality_Ensembles; split; auto with sets.
exists S; split; auto with sets.

Record filter_subbasis {X:Type} (F:Filter X) (B:Family X) : Prop := { filter_subbasis_elements: Included B (filter_family F); filter_subbasis_cond: forall S:Ensemble X, In (filter_family F) S -> exists J:Type, FiniteT J /\ exists T:J->Ensemble X, (forall j:J, In B (T j)) /\ Included (IndexedIntersection T) S }.
Hypothesis B_subbasis_cond: forall (J:Type) (V:J->Ensemble X), FiniteT J -> (forall j:J, In B (V j)) -> Inhabited (IndexedIntersection V).
exists (Intersection S1 S2); split; auto with sets.
assert (Included B (finite_intersections B)); auto with sets.
Definition ultrafilter {X:Type} (F:Filter X) : Prop := forall S:Ensemble X, In (filter_family F) S \/ In (filter_family F) (Ensembles.Complement S).
Lemma ultrafilter_extension: forall {X:Type} (F:Filter X), exists U:Filter X, Included (filter_family F) (filter_family U) /\ ultrafilter U.
pose (PO := { F':Filter X | Included (filter_family F) (filter_family F') }).
pose (PO_ord := fun (F1' F2':PO) => Included (filter_family (proj1_sig F1')) (filter_family (proj1_sig F2'))).
destruct x; destruct y; destruct z.
red in H; simpl in H.
red in H0; simpl in H0.

unshelve refine (let H0:=_ in let H1:=_ in let H2:=_ in let H3:=_ in let ub:=Build_Filter X (IndexedUnion (fun F':{F':PO | In S F'} => filter_family (proj1_sig (proj1_sig F')))) H0 H1 H2 H3 in _); [ | clearbody H0 | clearbody H0 H1 | clearbody H0 H1 H2 | clearbody H0 H1 H2 H3 ].
destruct (H (exist _ F1' i) (exist _ F2' i1)); trivial.
red in H2; simpl in H2.
red in H2; simpl in H2.
assert (forall S':Ensemble X, In (filter_family U) S' -> Inhabited (Intersection S' (Ensembles.Complement S))).
unshelve refine (let H2:=_ in let H3:=_ in let H4:=_ in let Uext := Build_Filter_from_basis (Im (filter_family U) (fun S':Ensemble X => Intersection S' (Ensembles.Complement S))) H2 H3 H4 in _).
apply Extensionality_Ensembles; split; auto with sets.
rewrite H6 in H8; destruct H8.
rewrite H7 in H9; destruct H9.
assert (filter_basis Uext (Im (filter_family U) (fun S':Ensemble X => Intersection S' (Ensembles.Complement S)))).
assert (filter_basis Uext (Im (filter_family U) (fun S':Ensemble X => Intersection S' (Ensembles.Complement S)))).
apply Extensionality_Ensembles; split; auto with sets.
Definition filter_direct_image {X Y:Type} (f:X->Y) (F:Filter X) : Filter Y.
refine (Build_Filter Y [ S:Ensemble Y | In (filter_family F) (inverse_image f S) ] _ _ _ _).
apply filter_upward_closed with (inverse_image f S1); auto with sets.
Hypothesis F_G_compat: forall S T:Ensemble X, In (filter_family F) S -> In (filter_family G) T -> Inhabited (Intersection S T).

refine (Build_Filter_from_basis (Im [ p:(Ensemble X)*(Ensemble X) | let (S,T):=p in In (filter_family F) S /\ In (filter_family G) T ] (fun p:(Ensemble X)*(Ensemble X) => let (S,T):=p in Intersection S T)) _ _ _).
exists ( (Intersection S1 S2, Intersection T1 T2) ).

command: replace (IndexedIntersection S) with (Intersection (IndexedIntersection (fun a:T => S (Some a))) (S None)).
replace (IndexedIntersection S) with (IndexedIntersection (fun x:X0 => S (f x))).
refine (Build_Filter X [ S:Ensemble X | exists T:Ensemble X, In B T /\ Included T S ] _ _ _ _).
destruct (B_basis_cond T1 T2 H H0) as [T' []].
exists T; split; auto with sets.
apply Extensionality_Ensembles; split; auto with sets.
exists S; split; auto with sets.
exists (Intersection S1 S2); split; auto with sets.
assert (Included B (finite_intersections B)); auto with sets.
refine (Build_Filter Y [ S:Ensemble Y | In (filter_family F) (inverse_image f S) ] _ _ _ _).
apply filter_upward_closed with (inverse_image f S1); auto with sets.

refine (Build_Filter_from_basis (Im [ p:(Ensemble X)*(Ensemble X) | let (S,T):=p in In (filter_family F) S /\ In (filter_family G) T ] (fun p:(Ensemble X)*(Ensemble X) => let (S,T):=p in Intersection S T)) _ _ _).
exists ( (Intersection S1 S2, Intersection T1 T2) ).
